# UISwitch.Style.checkbox

**Case**

A style indicating that the switch appears as a Mac-style checkbox.

## Declaration

```swift
case checkbox
```

## Discussion

This style is only available to Mac apps built with Mac Catalyst that use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUserInterfaceIdiom/mac] idiom. For more information about the Mac idiom, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/choosing-a-user-interface-idiom-for-your-mac-app].

## Styles

- **UISwitch.Style.automatic**: A style indicating that the system chooses the appearance of the switch according to the current user interface idiom.
- **UISwitch.Style.sliding**: A style indicating that the switch appears as an on/off slider.
